"with open(filename, 'w') as f:"
'pickle.dump(model, f)'
'mlflow.log_artifact(filename)'
'Models'
'A model in MLflow is also an artifact. However, we make stronger assumptions aout'
'this type of artifacts. Such assumptions provide a clear contract etween the saved files'
'and what they mean. When you log your models as artifacts (simple files), you need to'
'know what the model uilder meant for each of them in order to know how to load the'
